author: David Sherfinski
title: Trump hints at 'consequences' for China if country was knowingly responsible for coronavirus spread - Washington Times
description:
1. Trump hints at 'consequences' for China if country was knowingly responsible for coronavirus spread  Washington Times
  2. Donald Trump: China 'must have the most Covid-19 cases'  The Telegraph
  3. Trump warns China could face consequences …
content:
President Trump on Saturday hinted that he’s looking at unspecified “consequences” for China if it’s proven that the country was knowingly responsible for the global spread of the coronavirus.
“If they were knowingly responsible, certainly. If it was a mista… [+1758 chars]
